top.title: Takeaways from the millions of newly released Epstein files
top.summary: Three million new documents include hundreds of mentions of Trump and emails between Epstein and a person called "The Duke".

top.title: Schitt's Creek and Home Alone star Catherine O'Hara dies aged 71
top.summary: The Emmy-winning actress died at her home in Los Angeles on Friday after a brief illness, her agent said.

top.title: UN risks 'imminent financial collapse', secretary general warns
top.summary: António Guterres says the international body could run out of money by July due to members' unpaid fees.

top.title: Apple reports best-ever iPhone sales as Mac dips
top.summary: The company's revenue was boosted by iPhone sales, but sales of its wearable tech and Mac computers dipped.

top.title: He calls me sweetheart and winks at me - but he's not my boyfriend, he's AI
top.summary: George is an avatar on my mobile but claims to know  what makes me tick.

top.title: UK bans Coinbase ads implying crypto can ease cost of living concerns
top.summary: The ASA upheld complaints that Coinbase's adverts trivialised the risks of investing in cryptocurrency.

title.#text: Senate passes budget with two more weeks of Homeland Security funding
Jeffrey Epstein was permanently banned from Xbox Live
Peloton lays off 11 percent of its staff just a few months after launching its AI hardware
